original_text: But from now on, the Son of Man will be sitting in the most important place. He will be sitting at the right side of the Most Powerful God.’
korean_text: 그러나 이제부터는 인자가 하나님의 권능의 우편에 앉아 있으리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: But from now on, the Son of Man
will be sitting in the most important place
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 중요한 곳에 앉아 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will be sitting at the right side
